Santa_Clarita.Saugus High School (California):
Saugus High School is an American public secondary school located in the Santa Clarita, California community of Saugus, California, and part of the William S. Hart Union High School District.


== Facilities ==

Saugus' campus is built on a hill, with a leveled upper and lower campus and a sloped quad in between the two campuses. The A, B, C, D, E, F, and G buildings are located on the lower campus.
